attributes.action: RAISE THE MOTORWAY SPEED LIMIT TO 80MPH
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A large number of cars travel at 80mph on motorways at present, and this should be reflected in the law. However, for cars exceeding the 80mph limit, much stiffer penalties should be introduced.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
